description: Request for Standing Offer for supply of coffee and tea
full_summary:
================================

### EC095-230007 RMSO Coffee Zone 3 / OCPR Cafe Zone 3

#### Reference Number: WS4220654570-Doc4444040936

#### Solicitation Number: WS4220654570

#### Amendment Number: 1

#### Notice Publication Date: March 12, 2024

#### Tender Closing Date and Time: April 8, 2024 at 14:00 (Local Time)

#### Amendment Date: March 14, 2024

### Tender Brief Description

The government invites interested suppliers to participate in a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for coffee and tea supplies in Zone 3 of the Regional Service Centres (RSCs) across the Atlantic provinces in Canada.

### Tender Information:

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Deliverable Regions**: New Brunswick, Nova Scotia, Newfoundland and Labrador, and Canada

### Contract Details:

* **Contract Start Date**: October 1, 2023 (Expected)
* **Contract End Date**: May 14, 2025 (Expected)

### Contract Contact:

Sheppard, Tara (SPAC/PSPC)
[Email: tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

You can find the complete tender notice on the [official site](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19064931?extsite=MTkwNjQ5MzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
